articles.title: 'Chaos, panic all around', youth who had narrow escape opens up about CUSAT stampede - Onmanorama
articles.description: Four including three students died and nearly 50 were injured in the stampede during a Tech Fest at CUSAT on Saturday night.
articles.content: Kochi: I couldnt first fathom what was happening. I was at the forefront. I heard shouts from behind and turned around and people started falling on me. Then there was a chaotic symphony of panicked … [+1919 chars]
